title: RHOP: La'Dame-sel in Distress
description:
"The Real Housewives of Potomac" wraps up its triumphant fourth season with the long awaited reveal of Karen's new fragrance, LA'DAME. Plus, Ashley learns that she's finally pregnant, and Robyn gets the "commitment" from Juan she's been waiting for.
Get tix to our live shows: http://watchwhatcrappens.com
Subscribe on iTunes: http://bit.ly/ituneswwc
Video Recaps: http://bit.ly/crappensvideo

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
